predicate.note: Frames file for 'intimidate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to make timid, fill with fear

example.name: transitive
example.text: Congress learned during the Reagan administration that it could intimidate the executive branch by [*-1] uttering again and again the same seven words : `` Provided , that no funds shall be spent [*-48] ... . ''
